name: purescript-concur-starter
description: A Starter kit for Purescript-Concur. Uses Spago and Parcel.

scripts.dev: rimraf dist && spago build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel build --public-url ./ ./src/html/index.html
scripts.prod: rimraf prod dist && mkdir prod && spago bundle-app --main Main --to prod/index.prod.js && java -jar closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --js prod/index.prod.js --js_output_file prod/index.js && cp ./src/html/index.html prod/index.html && parcel build --public-url ./ prod/index.html && rimraf prod

author: Anupam Jain <ajnsit@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ajnsit)
